name: CV
description: A simple, modern CV/resume template. This CV is built using this template.

name: Chrome Meme Search
description: A Chrome extension that lets you make spotlight search for memes.

name: BounCoursePlanner
description: Course schedule planner for Boğaziçi University students. Finds the best schedule for a set of courses, which has the least conflicts and most free hours.

name: BUEvents
description: Events calendar for Boğaziçi University. It's the only events calendar since there isn't any official one.

name: BUYemek
description: An iOS app for Boğaziçi University's cafeteria. There is also a separate project for its REST API.

name: SkateMate
description: SkateMate enables skaters to find and share new spots, and connect with each other in real-time. It was our ENG 493 - Launching a Successful Software Startup course project in 2016 Fall term, at Boğaziçi University. I was responsible for the development of the mobile application (cross-platform, built with Ionic).

name: Panic Bracelet
description: A smart bracelet that shows you the probability of being harassed in a neighborhood, and sends a message to your loved ones and the police when pressed.

name: Wower
description: An app for cyber attack protection which protects the user's files and tracks the attacker.

name: WowDoor
description: An IoT device that gives the ability to lock & unlock doors with a smartphone.

name: EngelsizMenu
description: Accessible, easy-to-use restaurant menu app for visually impaired.

name: IlanTakip
description: Automatic tracking system for some real-estate listing sites in Turkey.

name: dekrypt
description: A command-line tool for automatic decryption/decipher of a number of encryption/cipher algorithms.
